meanings.definition: A condition characterized by thickened, white patches on the mucous membranes of the mouth or other areas of the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leukoplakia after noticing white patches in their mouth.
meanings.sent2: Leukoplakia can sometimes be a sign of oral health issues.
meanings.sent3: When the magician opened his mouth, instead of a rabbit, leukoplakia patches appeared!
meanings.sent4: The snowy field resembled a vast expanse of leukoplakia patches.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a haunting picture of leukoplakia covering the walls of an abandoned house.
